meanings.definition: To operate a foot pedal on a sewing machine by pressing it up and down.
meanings.sent1: She was treddling the sewing machine to stitch the fabric together.
meanings.sent2: I treddle the pedal gently to control the speed of the sewing machine.
meanings.sent3: The sound of treddling the pedal was like a rhythmic dance on the floor.
meanings.sent4: Her foot moved swiftly, treddling the pedal like a musician playing a piano.
meanings.sent5: Treddling the pedal requires coordination and precision to sew accurately.

meanings.definition: The act of using a foot pedal on a sewing machine.
meanings.sent1: Her treddling of the machine was smooth and steady.
meanings.sent2: The treddling of the pedal determines the sewing speed.
meanings.sent3: The cat watched with curiosity as she performed the treddling on the sewing machine.
meanings.sent4: The treddling of the pedal felt like a heartbeat guiding the sewing process.
meanings.sent5: With each treddling motion, the needle danced through the fabric.

meanings.definition: The movement of pressing a foot pedal up and down.
meanings.sent1: The constant treddling of the pedal can be tiring after a while.
meanings.sent2: His treddling was so consistent that the sewing machine hummed in rhythm.
meanings.sent3: The treddling motion resembled a seesaw in action.
meanings.sent4: As she kept treddling, the fabric transformed into a beautiful creation.
meanings.sent5: The treddling of the pedal was like a dance routine for her feet.
